players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm really shocked about Alice's death. We need to stay united and vote out Charlie—he might be the mafia hiding in plain sight."
Diana: "Bob, that's a pretty aggressive accusation right off the bat. Charlie, what's your take on this? We should hear from everyone before jumping to conclusions."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, you're desperate to throw me under the bus. If you're the detective, why not investigate someone else? I think you're the mafia lying to save your skin!"
Charlie: "Diana, I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town and end this threat."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, your claim makes sense. Bob's immediate aggression toward you after your revelation is suspicious. I'm inclined to trust your investigation."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob, that's a pretty aggressive accusation right off the bat. Charlie, what's your take on this? We should hear from everyone before jumping to conclusions."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, you're desperate to throw me under the bus. If you're the detective, why not investigate someone else? I think you're the mafia lying to save your skin!"
You: "Diana, I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town and end this threat."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, your claim makes sense. Bob's immediate aggression toward you after your revelation is suspicious. I'm inclined to trust your investigation."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
